column1: question
Tell me about yourself.
Why are you interested in this position?
What are your greatest strengths?
What is your biggest weakness?
Can you describe a challenging situation and how you handled it?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
Why should we hire you?
What do you know about our company?
How do you prioritize tasks when everything feels urgent?
Tell me about a time you worked in a team.
Tell me about a time you failed and how you responded.
How do you handle feedback?
Describe your ideal work environment.
What motivates you to do your best work?
How do you handle tight deadlines?
How do you stay organized?
Tell me about a decision you made that you regret.
What do you do if you disagree with your manager?
What is your proudest professional achievement?
How do you handle stress or pressure at work?
